required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: TGR-1202 Alone and in Combination With Either Nab-paclitaxel + Gemcitabine or With FOLFOX in Patients With Select Relapsed or Refractory Solid Tumors
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase I Study Evaluating the Safety and Efficacy of TGR 1202 Alone and in Combination With Either Nab-paclitaxel + Gemcitabine or With FOLFOX in Patients With Select Relapsed or Refractory Solid Tumors

brief_summary.textblock: This is a Phase 1 multi-center study to assess the safety and efficacy of TGR-1202 as a single agent or in combination with nab-paclitaxel + gemcitabine or with FOLFOX in patients with select relapsed or refractory solid tumors.

detailed_description.textblock: TGR-1202 will be evaluated alone or in combination with nab-paclitaxel + gemcitabine or with FOLFOX in patients with adenocarcinoma of the pancreas, adenocarcinoma of the colon, rectum, gastric and GE junction cancer, and GI Stromal Tumor (GIST) who have relapsed from or are refractory to prior treatment.

primary_outcome.measure: Adverse events as a measure of safety and tolerability of TGR-1202 as a single agent and in combination in combination with nab-paclitaxel + gemcitabine, or with oxaliplatin + leucovorin + 5-FU (FOLFOX) or with FOLFOX + bevacizumab.
primary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 28 days after the last patient enrolled
primary_outcome.description: To determine the incidence of adverse events, any potential abnormal laboratory results and any dose-limiting toxicities.

secondary_outcome.description: Overall response rate with TGR-1202 as a single agent and in combination with nab-paclitaxel + gemcitabine, or with oxaliplatin + leucovorin + 5-FU (FOLFOX) or with FOLFOX + bevacizumab.
Duration of response with TGR-1202 as a single agent and in combination with nab-paclitaxel + gemcitabine, or with oxaliplatin + leucovorin + 5-FU (FOLFOX) or with FOLFOX + bevacizumab.

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetic (PK) profile of TGR-1202. Peak Plasma Concentration (Cmax).
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At selected timepoints up through 6 months
secondary_outcome.description: This endpoint will measure the plasma PK profile of TGR-1202 as a single agent and in combination with nab-paclitaxel + gemcitabine, or with oxaliplatin + leucovorin + 5-FU (FOLFOX) or with FOLFOX + bevacizumab.

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetic (PK) profile of TGR-1202. Time to Peak Plasma Concentration (Tmax).
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At selected timepoints up through 6 months

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetic (PK) profile of TGR-1202. Area under the plasma concentration versus time curve (AUC)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At selected timepoints up through 6 months

arm_group.description: TGR-1202 oral daily dose + nab-paclitaxel + gemcitabine both as an IV infusion
TGR-1202 oral daily dose + oxaliplatin IV infusion + leucovorin IV infusion followed by 5-fluorouracil IV bolus followed by 5-FU IV infusion (FOLFOX regimen)
TGR-1202 oral daily dose + oxaliplatin IV infusion + leucovorin IV infusion followed by 5-fluorouracil IV bolus followed by 5-FU IV infusion (FOLFOX regimen) + bevacizumab IV infusion

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Histologically confirmed:
1. adenocarcinoma of the pancreas (pancreatic cancer)
2. adenocarcinoma of the colon or rectum (colorectal cancer)
3. adenocarcinoma of the gastric (gastric cancer)
4. esophageal cancer
5. gastrointestinal stromal tumor (GIST)
- Relapsed or refractory disease
- Measurable lesion by RECIST 1.1
Exclusion Criteria:
- Known Hepatitis B, C or HIV infection
- Previous therapy with any drug that inhibits the PI3K pathway
- Anti-tumor therapy within 21 days of study Day 1
